summary: A simple player house idyllically situated by a waterfall near Riverwood. Remember? Riverwood, the lovely town you pass after having escaped Helgen at the very beginning and where I had fallen in love with Skyrim. Which is why I chose this location to place my house mod.
descriptionHtml:
A simple player house idyllically situated by a waterfall near Riverwood. Remember? Riverwood, the lovely town you pass after having escaped Helgen at the very beginning and where I had fallen in love with Skyrim.                              
Which is why I chose this location to place my house mod.
The house features some pretty valuable stuff that can be discovered quite easily.                    For instance: A Spell Tome for summoning an armored Battle Troll! 
There are two basic characters and further ones in the hidden bath. Including Sauron the Deer :) Also, when you take a look at the waterfall to your left, you\'ll discover a diving board like the one at the Bard\'s Leap Summit.
BTW this is my very first mod, so be lenient with me :)


IMPORTANT: The Mod doesn\'t work at all if Hearthfire is not installed. 


Notes:

Works just fine with Dawnguard, Dragonborn and also Hearthfire, but there might be an issue if Dawnguard isn\'t installed for the house features a Dawnguard exclusive weapon.

Best combined with http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34566//? (adult content, nudity) :)

Update Version 1.10: Big Update with lots of clutter and an internal dungeon inhabited by Sauron the Deer
Update Version 1.11: Bug Fixes incl. Dark Face Bug and added some small stuff, Effects, Ambient etc
Update Version 1.12: Bug Fixes and Enhancements + enhanced Bard (tell me if there is an issue with him)
Update Version 1.13: Enhancements + New: Summonable Battle Troll, Book can be found in the house itself (sorry forgot to pack the bsa file :S, gonna reupload version 1.13 properly)
Update Version 1.20: Exciting update with Sauron the Deer now being able to follow you!
Update: Again forgot to pack something and I cannot access my PC this Weekend, I\'m very sorry...
Update Version 1.21: Small stuff and still working on the issue of Sauron not being able to follow you through doors...


Installation:

Just download the file, extract it and copy the rakiir.esp as well as the rakiir.bsa into the Skyrim Data Folder and you\'re good to go.



PS: Don\'t know how to open the gate and/or find the hidden trap door? Check out the images above (seven last ones)
author: Paludis
